intro: In Tales of Autumn rebuilding your farm and animal care go hand-in-hand! Befriend chimaeras, help the town, and become the hero of this story!
description:
Tales of Autumn is a wild farming RPG with an emphasis on animals and terrain management. Develop the abandoned ranch, befriend the wildlife, build relationships and earn the trust of the town.

TERRA-FARMING
On your ranch, you can befriend and tame wild creatures while raising farm animals, each with their own unique needs. Shape the land to create different biomes, influencing the crops you can grow and the animals that will be drawn to your farm. Traditional livestock can be raised in barns and coops, providing valuable resources and cutesy companionship


YOU WON’T BE LONELY
Your choices impact the town—good deeds will earn you rewards, discounts, friendship, and helping hands while neglecting the community will result in your neighbours becoming distant. Build relationships with the townsfolk, learn their stories, and let them become part of your adventure - and what a fantastic journey it can be!


UNIQUE EVENTS FOR EVERY SEASON
Relax by casting your fishing rod at the docks or lake, complete with fun minigames and a variety of lures. Discover a lively festival calendar, along with unique character and creature events that unfold as you progress.


KEY FEATURES
- Creature Taming – Befriend and care for wild and farm animals, each with specific needs.
- Karma System – The town reacts to your behavior, offering rewards for kindness or keeping their distance if ignored.
- Relationships – Get to know the townsfolk, hear their stories, and invite them into your journey.
- Fishing – Engage in a fishing minigame with different lures.
- Festivals & Events – Take part in town celebrations and creature events.
